Name: Beholder
SubTitle: Minion Aberration
Text: Whenever you purchase or use a basic action die, deal 1 to target opponent or creature.
Global: Pay 1 energy. Move a die showing an action face from your reserve to your prep area. Do not roll it next turn.

Name: Beholder
SubTitle: Apprentice Aberration
Text: When fielded, move up to 2 of your fielded NPCs to the used pile. For each one moved, you may purchase a basic action die at no cost.
Global: Pay 1 energy. Move a die showing an action face from your reserve to your prep area. Do not roll it next turn.

Name: Beholder
SubTitle: Master Aberration
Text: If this is the first die assigned to attack this turn, you may immediately use each of the basic action dice abilities, without bursts, once, as if you had rolled those dice.
Global: Pay 1 energy. Move a die showing an action face from your reserve to your prep area. Do not roll it next turn.

Name: Blessing
SubTitle: Basic Action
Text:
Each of your characters gets +1A and +1D.
#** Two of your characters get an additional +1A and +1D.

Name: Blue Dragon
SubTitle: Lesser Dragon
Text: While active, whenever you use an action die's ability, deal 1 damage to all characters (both players').

Name: Blue Dragon
SubTitle: Apprentice Dragon
Text: While active, whenever you use an action die's ability, choose an opposing character. That character can't block this turn.

Name: Carrion Crawler
SubTitle: Lesser Aberration
Text: When fielded, knock out an opposing NPC.
Global: Pay [BOLT]. Deal 1 damage to an NPC.

Name: Carrion Crawler
SubTitle: Paragon Aberration
Text: When assigned to attack, roll all opposing NPCs. Move those showing energy faces to the prep area.

Name: Carrion Crawler
SubTitle: Greater Aberration
Text: When assigned to attack, knock out an opposing NPC.
Global: Pay [BOLT]. Deal 1 damage to an NPC.

Name: Charm
SubTitle: Basic Action
Text:
Draw 3 dice. Roll any NPCs you drew. Place the other dice in your used pile.
#** You may instead choose to roll one of the dice and place the other two in your used pile.

Name: Copper Dragon
SubTitle: Lesser Dragon
Text: When fielded, put a gear equipped to an opposing character into his prep area.

Name: Copper Dragon
SubTitle: Paragon Dragon
Text:
If active at the end of the turn, roll all gear equipped to opposing characters that took damage. If the result is an energy face, put the gear in the used pile.
#Knock out attackers blocked by this character at the end of the attack step.

Name: Copper Dragon
SubTitle: Legendary Dragon
Text: Breath Weapon 1.  When you KO an opposing character with Copper Dragon's Breath Weapon you may move an NPC die from your Used Pile to your Prep Area.

Name: Copper Dragon
SubTitle: Greater Dragon
Text: If active at the end of the turn, reroll all gear equipped to opposing characters that took damage this turn. If the result is an energy face, put it in the used pile.

Name: Dimension Door
SubTitle: Basic Action
Text: One target character you control cannot be blocked this turn.

Name: Dracolich
SubTitle: Paragon Undead Dragon
Text: While active, your opponent takes one damage each time either player rolls (but not rerolls) an action die.

Name: Dracolich
SubTitle: Greater Undead Dragon
Text: When fielded, you may purchase a basic action die at no cost and roll it. You may use it if it shows an action face. Otherwise, put it into your bag.

Name: Dracolich
SubTitle: Lesser Undead Dragon
Text: When assigned to attack, draw 2 dice from your bag. Spin action dice drawn to an action face with no bursts and place them in your reserve. Return character dice to the bag.

Name: Drow Assassin
SubTitle: Paragon Humano_id
Text: At the end of the attack step, knock out all adventurers engaged with this character.

Name: Drow Assassin
SubTitle: Minion Humano_id
Text: Once per turn, you may send one of your Drow Assassin dice to the Used Pile to deal 2 damage to one of your opponent's characters.

Name: Drow Assassin
SubTitle: Greater Humano_id
Text:
Cannot be blocked by adventurers.
#If Drow Assassin damages an opponent, you may knock out an adventurer.

Name: Dwarf Cleric
SubTitle: Greater Emerald Enclave
Text: This character takes no damage from undead monsters.

Name: Dwarf Cleric
SubTitle: Legendary Order of the Gauntlet
Text: Experience Once per turn, while Dwarf Cleric is Active, after you declare blockers, you may choose one of your blockers. Prevent all damage dealt to that blocker this turn.

Name: Dwarf Cleric
SubTitle: Paragon Emerald Enclave
Text: When assigned to attack, reroll all opposing undead characters. Move any dice showing energy faces to the used pile.

Name: Dwarf Cleric
SubTitle: Lesser Order of the Gauntlet
Text: When fielded, knock out an undead monster of equal or lower level.

Name: Elf Wizard
SubTitle: Greater Order of the Gauntlet
Text:
When fielded, action dice cost 1 less to purchase.
#When assigned to block, move an action die from your used pile to your prep area.

Name: Elf Wizard
SubTitle: Lesser Harper
Text:
When fielded, action dice cost 1 less to purchase.
#When assigned to attack, move an action die from your used pile to your prep area.

Name: Elf Wizard
SubTitle: Legendary Harper
Text: Experience When Elf Wizard attacks, you may purchase an action die for 2 energy less than normal (to a minimum of 1).

Name: Elf Wizard
SubTitle: Paragon Zhentarim
Text:
When fielded, action dice cost 1 less to purchase.
#When assigned to attack, roll up to two action dice from your opponent's used pile and use any actions rolled. Return the dice afterward.

Name: Finger of Death
SubTitle: Basic Action
Text:
Move a level 1 character from the field to its prep area.
#* Instead, move a character of any level.
#** Instead, move a character of any level to its bag.

Name: Fireball
SubTitle: Basic Action
Text:
Deal two damage to each player and each character.
#You may also spend [BOLT] to deal 1 damage to a target character (you may do this multiple times).
#** Deal 1 additional damage to each player and each character.

Name: Frost Giant
SubTitle: Lesser Elemental
Text: Frost Giant can only be blocked by two or more characters.

Name: Frost Giant
SubTitle: Paragon Elemental
Text: When Frost Giant attacks, after blockers are assigned, remove one blocker from the attack zone (it remains in the field).

Name: Frost Giant
SubTitle: Greater Elemental
Text: When Frost Giant is blocked, choose a character that is not engaged with it. That character cannot attack during your opponent's next turn.

Name: Gelatinous Cube
SubTitle: Master Ooze
Text: Whenever a character is knocked out during the attack step, you may pay [SHIELD] to have Gelatinous Cube capture it. This capture lasts until it is used again. Gelatinous Cube may block any number of NPCs.

Name: Gelatinous Cube
SubTitle: Minion Ooze
Text: When fielded, capture an opposing NPC. This capture lasts until you field another Gelatinous Cube.

Name: Gelatinous Cube
SubTitle: Apprentice Ooze
Text: Whenever a character is knocked out during the attack step, you may pay [SHIELD] to have Gelatinous Cube capture it. This capture lasts until it is used again.

Name: Green Dragon
SubTitle: Legendary Dragon
Text: Breath Weapon 1. Once per turn during your Main Step you may KO one of your NPCs to give Green Dragon +2A and +2D until end of turn.

Name: Green Dragon
SubTitle: Lesser Dragon
Text: Characters damaged by this Breath Weapon cannot block. Your opponent may prevent this by paying 1 life.

Name: Green Dragon
SubTitle: Master Dragon
Text: Spin each character damaged by this breath weapon down 1 level

Name: Half-Dragon
SubTitle: Paragon Humano_id
Text:
While active, dragons cost you 2 less to purchase, to a minimum of 1.
#While active, when you field a Dragon, you may purchase an action die for 3 less cost (minimum 0).

Name: Half-Dragon
SubTitle: Greater Humano_id
Text:
While active, dragons cost you 1 less to purchase, to a minimum of 1.
#While active, when you field a Dragon, deal 1 damage to your opponent.

Name: Half-Dragon
SubTitle: Lesser Humano_id
Text:
While active, dragons cost you 1 less to purchase, to a minimum of 1.
#While active, your dragons get +1A and +1D when attacking.

Name: Halfling Thief
SubTitle: Lesser Lords Alliance
Text: When one or more Halfling Thief dice are assigned to attack, you may move up to 2 of your opponent's dice from his used area to his bag.

Name: Halfling Thief
SubTitle: Minion Lords Alliance
Text: * Your opponent may not deal damage to this character during the Main Step.

Name: Halfling Thief
SubTitle: Apprentice Emerald Enclave
Text: When fielded, your opponent draws 2 dice (this triggers no effects). You choose whether to place each die either back in the bag or in the used pile.

Name: Halfling Thief
SubTitle: Master Zhentarim
Text: * When assigned to attack, you may knock out an opposing adventurer before your opponent moves the die.

Name: Halfling Thief
SubTitle: Minion Harper
Text: * When fielded, draw a die. If it is an NPC, place it in your used pile. If not, roll it.

Name: Half-Orc Fighter
SubTitle: Paragon Zhentarim
Text:
When you field this character, you may immediately use the Equip ability to equip a gear die to it.
#While it has a gear is equipped, Half-Orc gets +3A when engaged with a good character.

Name: Half-Orc Fighter
SubTitle: Lesser Emerald Alliance
Text: Gets +1A and +1D while it has gear equipped.

Name: Half-Orc Fighter
SubTitle: Greater Lords of Alliance
Text: While active, gear dice cost you 2 less to purchase, to a minimum of 1.

Name: Human Paladin
SubTitle: Apprentice Harper
Global: Pay [SHIELD]. Reduce the damage you take from a character's ability to 1

Name: Human Paladin
SubTitle: Minion Order of the Gauntlet
Text: When fielded, your Paladins and NPCs take no damage for the rest of the turn.

Name: Human Paladin
SubTitle: Master Lords Alliance
Text: When active, you take no damage from your opponent's "when fielded" effects (your characters are not protected).

Name: Human Paladin
SubTitle: Lesser Emerald Enclave
Text: While active, your characters in the field cannot be affected by global abilities used by your opponent.
Global: Pay [SHIELD]. Reduce the damage you take from a character's ability to 1.

Name: Invisible Stalker
SubTitle: Greater Elemental
Text: While active, you may move this character to the used pile to prevent all damage from a character that damages you either with an ability or during the attack step.

Name: Invisible Stalker
SubTitle: Paragon Elemental
Text:
Invisible Stalker must block if able.
#When fielded, at least one character must attack on your opponent's next turn (if able).

Name: Invisible Stalker
SubTitle: Lesser Elemental
Text: If one Invisible Stalker die attacks alone, it cannot be blocked.

Name: Kobold
SubTitle: Lesser Humano_id
Text: * When fielded, spin each of your other fielded Kobolds up 1 level.

Name: Kobold
SubTitle: Greater Humano_id
Text:
Must attack if your opponent controls any adventurers.
#At least one adventurer must block this Kobold (if able).

Name: Kobold
SubTitle: Paragon Humano_id
Text: Gets +1A and +1D if your opponent has any good characters in the field.

Name: Limited Wish
SubTitle: Paragon Spell
Text:
Search your bag for a character die and field it on its level 1 s_ide.
#** Also move a Tarrasque from the field to the prep area.

Name: Limited Wish
SubTitle: Greater Spell
Text: Name a non-NPC die. Your opponent pulls a die from his bag. If it is the named die, return it to its card (as if it had not been purchased). Otherwise, place it in the bag or its used pile.

Name: Limited Wish
SubTitle: Lesser Spell
Text: Choose an unpurchased die (yours or from the basic action cards) and roll it. If you roll a non-energy face, place the die in your used pile.

Name: Magic Helmet
SubTitle: Paragon Gear
Text: This equipped character takes no damage during the attack step.

Name: Magic Helmet
SubTitle: Greater Gear
Text: This equipped character cannot be affected by your opponent's action dice or character abilities.

Name: Magic Helmet
SubTitle: Lesser Gear
Text: Equipped character can only be blocked by two or more characters.

Name: Magic Missile
SubTitle: Basic Action
Text:
Deal 2 damage to target character or player.
#** Deal extra damage to a character equal to the level of your highest level adventurer in the field.
Global: Pay [BOLT]. Deal 1 damage to a character.

Name: Magic Sword
SubTitle: Paragon Gear
Text: Characters damaged by this equipped character are knocked out at the end of the attack step.

Name: Magic Sword
SubTitle: Greater Gear
Text: This equipped character gets +2A.

Name: Magic Sword
SubTitle: Lesser Gear
Text: This equipped character gets +1A and +1D.

Name: Manticore
SubTitle: Paragon Beast
Text: While active, whenever you roll [BOLT][BOLT] on a die and do not reroll the result, deal 2 damage to a character or player.

Name: Manticore
SubTitle: Greater Beast
Text: While active, deal 1 damage to each opposing character immediately after it is fielded.

Name: Manticore
SubTitle: Lesser Beast
Text: When assigned to attack, deal 1 damage to your opponent.

Name: Mind Flayer
SubTitle: Epic Humano_id
Text: When fielded, capture an opposing non-[MASK] character. This capture lasts until Mind Flayer leaves the field.

Name: Mind Flayer
SubTitle: Lesser Humano_id
Text: When fielded, if there is an opposing NPC in the field, you may knock it out and spin Mind Flayer up one level.

Name: Mind Flayer
SubTitle: Greater Humano_id
Text: When fielded, choose an energy type, canceling all previous choices. Creatures of that energy type cost your opponent 2 more to field while Mind Flayer is active. This effect lasts until you field another Mind Flayer.

Name: Minotaur
SubTitle: Greater Humano_id
Text: When assigned to attack, choose up to 2 opposing NPCs. Those NPCs cannot block.

Name: Minotaur
SubTitle: Lesser Humano_id
Text:
When fielded, Minotaur gets +1A and +1D for each opposing NPC (until the end of the turn).
#When fielded, opposing NPCs cannot block this turn.

Name: Minotaur
SubTitle: Paragon Humano_id
Text: When assigned to attack, Minotaur captures one opposing die of a lower level. This die remains captured until the capturing die leaves the field or uses the ability again.

Name: Minsc and Boo
SubTitle: Go for the eyes, Boo!
Text: While active, Minsc and Boo get an experience token (+1A and +1D) at the end of your turn. If Minsc and Boo go to the used pile, remove all of their experience tokens.  Once per turn, you may remove a token from Minsc and Boo to force an opposing character to block.

Name: Mummy
SubTitle: Paragon Undead
Text: When fielded, spin all adventurers (both players') down 1 level and remove one Experience counter from each adventurer card (if able).

Name: Mummy
SubTitle: Lesser Undead
Text: While active, [MASK] characters cost you 1 less to purchase, to a minimum of 1.

Name: Mummy
SubTitle: Greater Undead
Text: If one or more of your Mummies damages your opponent, gain life equal to the level of your highest level Mummy.

Name: Orc
SubTitle: Paragon Humano_id
Text: Gets +1A and +1D for each other Orc in the field (both players').

Name: Owlbear
SubTitle: Greater Beast
Text: When fielded, knock out an adventurer.

Name: Owlbear
SubTitle: Legendary Beast
Global: Pay [FIST]. Once Per Turn, target character gets +1A.

Name: Owlbear
SubTitle: Lesser Beast
Text: While active, all adventurers (both players') get -2A and -2D (knock out any adventurers that end up with 0D or less).

Name: Owlbear
SubTitle: Paragon Beast
Text: When an Owlbear attacks, all opposing Adventurers must block an Owlbear (if able).

Name: Pit Fiend
SubTitle: Paragon Fiend
Text: When you field your first Pit Fiend each turn, you may move 1 NPC die from your reserve pool to your used pile to draw 3 dice. Roll any evil character dice drawn this way. Place the other dice in your used pile.

Name: Pit Fiend
SubTitle: Greater Fiend
Text: When fielded, your fiends cost 2 less to field (minimum 0) for the rest of the turn.

Name: Pit Fiend
SubTitle: Lesser Fiend
Text: After you field your first Pit Fiend each turn, your fiends cost 2 less to purchase, to a minimum of 1 (for the rest of the turn).

Name: Polymorph
SubTitle: Basic Action
Text: Swap a fielded character with a non-NPC character from that player's used pile. Spin the character to level 1. This does not trigger "when fielded" effects.
Global: Pay [MASK]. Spin one of your characters down a level to spin another character up a level.

Name: Prismatic Spray
SubTitle: Greater Spell
Text: All characters are treated as if they had 1A and 1D(instead of their normal values, regardless of bonuses)until the end of the turn. Fielding costs remain unchanged.

Name: Prismatic Spray
SubTitle: Lesser Spell
Text: All of your opponent's characters lose all their card text until the end of the turn.

Name: Prismatic Spray
SubTitle: Paragon Spell
Text: Swap two of your non-NPC characters with 2 opposing characters until the end of the turn (each player plays them as if they own them). If the opposing characters are unblocked during your attack, they do not go to the used pile (they stay in the field).

Name: Purple Worm
SubTitle: Greater Beast
Text: When assigned to attack, knock out a character (either player's), then deal damage to your opponent equal to that character's level.

Name: Purple Worm
SubTitle: Paragon Beast
Text: When fielded, knock out all fielded characters (both players') that have a purchase cost of 4 or less.

Name: Red Dragon
SubTitle: Greater Dragon
Text: You may pay 2 life instead of 2 energy to pay this Breath Weapon cost.
Global: Once per turn, pay [BOLT]. When you purchase your next action die this turn, it costs 2 less (minimum 1) and you deal 1 damage to your opponent.

Name: Red Dragon
SubTitle: Lesser Dragon
Text: Field Red Dragon for free if your opponent has 2 or more non-NPC characters in the field.
Global: Once per turn, pay [BOLT]. When you purchase your next action die this turn, it costs 2 less (minimum 1) and you deal 1 damage to your opponent.

Name: Red Dragon
SubTitle: Epic Dragon
Text: While active, once per turn when you use an action die effect, you may use a second copy of its effect.
Global: Once per turn, pay [BOLT]. When you purchase your next action die this turn, it costs 2 less (minimum 1) and you deal 1 damage to your opponent.

Name: Resurrection
SubTitle: Basic Action
Text: Roll a die from your used pile (place it into your reserve).
Global: Once during your turn, pay [SHIELD] to draw a die from your bag and place it in your prep area.

Name: Skeleton
SubTitle: Greater Undead
Text: Adventurers deal 2 less damage to this character.

Name: Skeleton
SubTitle: Paragon Undead
Text: When fielded, if an opposing adventurer is in the field, you may purchase a Skeleton die at a cost of 1.

Name: Stinking Cloud
SubTitle: Basic Action
Text:
Deal 1 damage to all characters (both players').
#Level 1 characters can't attack or block this turn.

Name: Stirge
SubTitle: Greater Beast
Text: Stirge can only be blocked by adventurers.

Name: Stirge
SubTitle: Epic Beast
Text: If Stirge attacks alone, it cannot be blocked.

Name: Stirge
SubTitle: Lesser Beast
Text: Cannot be blocked by characters with a purchase cost of 3 or higher.

Name: Tarrasque
SubTitle: Greater Aberration
Text: When Tarrasque regenerates, knock out all adventurers (both players'). Deal 1 damage to your opponent for each adventurer knocked out this way.
Global: Pay [SHIELD]. Choose an attacking character. It goes to the used pile if knocked out this turn.

Name: Tarrasque
SubTitle: Lesser Aberration
Text: When Tarrasque regenerates, deal 4 damage to all other characters (both players').

Name: Tarrasque
SubTitle: Epic Aberration
Text: When Tarrasque regenerates, knock out all of your opponent's characters of equal or lower level.

Name: Treant
SubTitle: Paragon Beast
Text: While active, good characters that are blocking ignore damage from evil characters.
Global: Pay [SHIELD]. Prevent the next 2 damage that you (the player) take from an ability or action die this turn.

Name: Treant
SubTitle: Legendary Beast
Text: Treant costs 1 less to field for each Active [GOOD] character you control that is not a Treant.
Global: Pay [SHIELD]. Prevent the next 2 damage that you take from an ability or action die this turn.

Name: Treant
SubTitle: Lesser Beast
Text: While active, evil characters cost 1 more to field.
Global: Pay [SHIELD]. Prevent the next 2 damage that you(the player) take from an ability or action die this turn.

Name: Treant
SubTitle: Greater Beast
Text: While active, evil characters cost 1 more to purchase.
Global: Pay [SHIELD]. Prevent the next 2 damage that you (the player) take from an ability or action die this turn.

Name: Troll
SubTitle: Apprentice Humano_id
Text: The first time each turn a Troll regenerates, gain 2 life.

Name: Troll
SubTitle: Master Humano_id
Text: When Troll regenerates, knock out an opposing engaged creature and deal 1 damage to your opponent.

Name: Troll
SubTitle: Lesser Humano_id
Text: At the beginning of your turn, spin this character up one level.

Name: Umber Hulk
SubTitle: Paragon Beast
Text: When fielded, reroll all opposing level 1 and 2 characters. Move each die that shows an energy face to your opponent's used pile.

Name: Umber Hulk
SubTitle: Lesser Beast
Text: When fielded, choose an energy type. Your opponent cannot field characters of that type next turn.

Name: Umber Hulk
SubTitle: Greater Beast
Text: While active, your opponent cannot field NPCs.

Name: Unicorn
SubTitle: Paragon Beast
Text: While active, your other good characters get +2A and +2D.

Name: Unicorn
SubTitle: Lesser Beast
Text: While active, gain 1 life the first time each turn you field a good character.

Name: Unicorn
SubTitle: Greater Beast
Text: When fielded, if an opposing evil character is in the field, you may field good characters for free (until the end of the turn).

Name: Vampire
SubTitle: Minion Undead
Text: The first time each turn an attacking Vampire damages a character, gain 1 life.

Name: Vampire
SubTitle: Master Undead
Text: The first time each turn an attacking Vampire knocks out an adventurer, you gain 1 life and your opponent loses 1 life.

Name: Vampire
SubTitle: Apprentice Undead
Text: The first time each turn an attacking Vampire damages a character, gain 2 life, then draw a die and place it in your prep area.

Name: Vampire
SubTitle: Lesser Undead
Text: When assigned to attack, you may choose to force 1 monster or all adventurers to block a Vampire (if able).

Name: Wererat
SubTitle: Paragon Lycanthrope
Text: While active, your evil characters with a purchase cost of 3 or less cost 1 less to field (minimum 0).

Name: Wererat
SubTitle: Greater Lycanthrope
Text: While active, your evil characters with a purchase cost of 3 or less get +1A and +1D.

Name: Wererat
SubTitle: Lesser Lycanthrope
Text: While active, the first time during a turn that you draw a character that has the Swarm ability, draw one additional die.

Name: Zombie
SubTitle: Minion Undead
Text: If a Zombie is knocked out during combat, and it knocked out the character it was engaged with, return Zombie to the field on its level 1 face.

Name: Zombie
SubTitle: Lesser Undead
Text: After a Zombie is knocked out in an attack step, roll that die. If you roll a character face, return it to the field; otherwise place it in your prep area.

Name: Zombie
SubTitle: Greater Undead
Text: During the attack step, you may pay [SHIELD] to prevent all damage to a Zombie.

Name: Zombie
SubTitle: Paragon Undead
Text: After a Zombie is knocked out in the attack step, roll that die. If you roll a character face, knock out all opposing characters that were engaged with it. Place the Zombie in your prep area.
